effect.scarlet_violet: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.the_teal_mask: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
